column5: This is a take off of Pikeslayer8 .  I first have to say,I dont weave as good as he.  Marinade for 4 hours.    Slice in half and at some heat.    I stuffed/layered it with, prosciutto and baby spinach.        Fold back together    Wrap with bacon    On the grill it goes    Slice    And serve    Thanks for your post Pikeslayer8  Hope no one was hungry.LOL
looks good
Mmm dinner looks good .. Haha
Brian,sure looks good!!!!!,Pork loin,,my favorite.!!!!!!!!!!!
That looks terrible Brian!! Who would eat like that?                  ME............Thats who !!!!!
Famn that looks awesome. The prosciutta would be a awesome with that. I need to get a smoker lol.
MMMMM meat sandwich with meat bread........   Art
Best sandwich ever.
now why did you go and do that B?!?!  I just ate dinner and I want some of that!
I am to lazy to make that, however I sure could devour that in no time at all.
The kicker would of been some smoked goats cheese,but I could not find any. If I were to travel a bit,I could of.Next time.  Thanks  Im still stuffed.

Misfish,  Spectacular     	jaw   dropping    feast.    I think that your bacon weaving looks great and looked perfectly cooked, nice and juicy. 	What kind of awesome sauce did you finish it with?  Could that be added bacon on them taters?    Mmmmmm bacon.     Way to go Brian
OMG now I'm hungry B, thanks
Just finally got around to eating dinner and I could eat again after seeing that. Looks great!

After reading the 1rst post about this I had to try. My weaving skills also aren't the best,the veggies were all fresh from the garden & roasted in a pan right under the roast to catch all those bacon/pork drippings. It was a big hit with my GF & the neighbours.
Blue LK,  You guys truly honor me!  Looks fantastic.   I think your homegrown veggie tray is a most spectacular idea.    Looks great.
Thanks again all.    Yes it was juicy. I leave most of the cap on the roast as well. The sauce is fried brown mushrooms ,with 1/2&1/2, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce . Yes more bacon.LOL
WTH I gotta stop reading these food threads at 7am. They both look great
Oh yeah I thought it was about a great day fishing but should have known better it had 16 replies
That look's awesome Brian. How long does it take on the BBQ? I think I may have to go back to the store. Scooter
Ok what did you marinate it in B?
You have me starving! I guess I'll just have to settle for barbecued atlantic salmon LOL!
